definition: the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc

sentences.english: Diffusion characteristics of copper in lamellar and columnar nickel deposit are also determined.
sentences.chinese: 并分析了铜在柱状和块状镍镀层中的扩散系数。

sentences.english: The process is fast in deposition speed and excellent in corrosion resistance of the coating.
sentences.chinese: 该工艺沉积速率快，镀层耐蚀性优异。

sentences.english: The performance of metal nickel was stable, so often used as electroplating material.
sentences.chinese: 金属镍性能稳定，是常用的镀层材料。

sentences.english: Coating characteristic of zinc-nickel alloy was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了锌镍合金镀层特点。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制备了纯镍刷镀层和镍基纳米氧化铝复合刷镀层。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制备了纯镍刷镀层和镍基纳米氧化铝复合刷镀层。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties of the coating were measured by vibrating sample magnetometer(VSM).
sentences.chinese: 采用振动样品磁强计测试了镀层的磁性能。

sentences.english: Evaluated of hydrogen uptake and permeation in Zinc-Nickel alloy and metals by an electrochemical technique.
sentences.chinese: 电化学渗透方法能够实地监控和评价镀层的氢脆性能。

sentences.english: This rack is easy to produce, and improves thickness uniformity of electrodeposits.
sentences.chinese: 该挂具制作简单，能提高镀层厚度的均匀性。

sentences.english: Zinc plating chromic acid salt after the passivation, corrosion resistance can improve 6 to 8 times.
sentences.chinese: 锌镀层经铬酸盐钝化之后，耐蚀性可提高6～8倍。

sentences.english: The failure mechanism of plating Mo layer was flaking off.
sentences.chinese: 镀钼层的失效破坏以镀层剥落为主。

sentences.english: The friction and wear performances of the resulting (Fe-Ni)-MoS2 self-lubricating composite coating were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对所得到的复合镀层的摩擦磨损特性进行了研究。

sentences.english: The non-bright tin deposit has good solderability after sealing.
sentences.chinese: 封闭后的雾面锡镀层仍有良好的可焊性。

sentences.english: Brass coating for steel tire cord has several disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 钢帘线生产中，黄铜镀层存在一定缺陷。

sentences.english: In the mean time, the relation between remanent stress in plating and wear performance is emphatically analysed.
sentences.chinese: 同时，着重分析了镀层残余应力和磨损性能的关系。

sentences.english: The quality of tungsten coating obtained by pulse current is finer than that by direct current.
sentences.chinese: 脉冲给电获得的镀层比平波直流给电的质量高。
